mapper.select: SELECT DATA.* FROM (SELECT @ids AS _ids, (SELECT @ids := GROUP_CONCAT(id) FROM menu WHERE FIND_IN_SET(parent_id, @ids)) AS cids FROM menu, (SELECT @ids := (select id from menu where code = #{code}) b WHERE @ids IS NOT NULL) id, menu DATA WHERE FIND_IN_SET(DATA.id, ID._ids) ORDER BY id ;
